description: An archaeologist exploring a cave discovers a prehistoric painting of a mammoth and a bovid. Illuminated by his flashlight, a speech bubble emerges from the ancient artwork. This bubble contains text advertising companionship, a surreal juxtaposition of the Paleolithic era and modern communication methods. The scene presents the absurd irony of finding what amounts to ancient graffiti or a solicitation within significant historical art. It subverts expectations by suggesting that even deep in the past, human concerns might have included such mundane exchanges.
caption: null

other_text.text: FOR GOOD TIME CALL OONA ANAG-AX.
